history.narrative: Law 21-38, the “Unemployment Profile Act of 2015,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-17. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 14, 2015, and Sept. 22, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 16, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 21-166 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-38 became effective on Dec. 15, 2015.
